CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"One-Time"), 0, IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Annual"), Hours_Spent__c, IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Biannual"), Hours_Spent__c * 2 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Quarterly"), Hours_Spent__c* 4 , IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Monthly"), Hours_Spent__c* 12, IF( ISPICKVAL(Frequency__c,"Weekly"), Hours_Spent__c * 52, 0))))))
CustomField.label: Annual Recurring Hours Spent
